attributes.action: Stop Denbighshire County Coucil from approving the building of residential properties on flood plains.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Environment Agency shows parts of Rhyl as on a flood plain, yet Denbighshire County Council's Planning Department has approved the building of residential properties on a designated flood plain.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
